pullRequest.body:
In some cases, the order of implicit arguments changed
because now they appear in a different order in `variable`s.

Also, some definitions used greek letters for topological spaces,
changed to `X`/`Y`.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7785778521/job/21229135318)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7785778521/job/21229135640)

Hmmm, I get why you're doing that, but maybe we want to keep all of these together somewhere. I recall a long time ago there was some discussion about a documentation note listing all frequently-used filters so maybe it would belong there, but for now I think I prefer to keep the full list here.
All these are listed in the new file `Topology/Defs/Filter`. I can revert this change as well, if you want.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore(Topology): move some definitions to new files
